name: RUET Cafeteria Management System
description: A web-based cafeteria management system for RUET, providing a seamless experience for students and staff to order food online.
features: Student authentication using Firebase
Online food ordering system
Admin dashboard for managing meals
Order history and transaction tracking
Responsive design with dynamic meal categories
Infinite scrolling for meal listings
Real-time notifications with SweetAlert2
Payment integration with Stripe
Server-side search and filter for meal categories and prices
challenges: Ensuring smooth user authentication with Firebase.
Managing complex state for meal listings and user reviews.
Implementing infinite scrolling with performance optimization.
potentialImprovements: Integrating machine learning for personalized meal recommendations.
Expanding the admin dashboard with advanced analytics.
Adding a review moderation system for admins.

name: Nazirabazar Online Marketplace
description: A marketplace for Nazirabazar that connects local vendors with customers for buying and selling various products.
features: Email/password and Google login authentication
JWT token management for secure sessions
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Food detail page with expiry date, cook, poster, and summary
Private routes for authenticated users (Add Food, My Requests)
JWT-based token validation for protected routes
Clean, modern, and engaging UI with animations and gradients
challenges: Integrating JWT authentication and ensuring secure token storage.
Designing an intuitive UI for users on all devices.
Managing large-scale data efficiently with MongoDB.
potentialImprovements: Introducing advanced search filters and recommendations.
Adding real-time chat between vendors and customers.
Expanding the product categories and integrating a payment gateway.

name: Movie Portal
description: A movie management platform where users can browse, rate, and review their favorite movies.
features: Add and manage movies with rich details
Rate movies with a star rating system
Secure login and registration with Firebase Authentication
Personalized favorites list for users
Private routes to access personal data (Favorites, Add Movie)
View detailed movie information, including posters and summaries
Responsive design using TailwindCSS
challenges: Ensuring secure user authentication with Firebase.
Implementing a responsive UI that works seamlessly across devices.
Handling large media assets (movie posters, banners) efficiently.
potentialImprovements: Integrating an API for live movie data and reviews.
Allowing users to create and share movie lists.
Expanding the movie database with user-generated content.
